name: Summon Infernal
description:
Summons an Infernal from the Twisting Nether, impacting for 3,330 Fire damage and stunning all enemies in the area for 2 sec.

The Infernal will serve you for 30 sec, dealing 2,668 damage to all nearby enemies every 1.8 sec and generating 1 Soul Shard Fragment every 0.5 sec.
